FuncDef:
The mrru command configures an MRRU for an MP-group interface.
The undo mrru command restores the default MRRU of an MP-group interface.
By default, the MRRU value of an MP-group interface is 1500 bytes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MRRU of an MP-group interface. The unit is byte.
The value varies according to device types.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The interface MRRU used in LCP negotiation is closely related to the interface MTU:
If the MRRU of the peer MP-group interface is greater than or equal to the MTU of the local MP-group interface, the local MP-group interface keeps its MTU unchanged.If the MRRU of the peer MP-group interface is smaller than the MTU of the local MP-group interface, the local MP-group interface uses the MRRU of the peer MP-group interface as its MTU after LCP negotiation.
